remarks: Axiom of Quantified Negation.  This axiom is used to manipulate negated quantifiers.  Equivalent to axiom scheme C7' in [Megill] p. 448 (p. 16 of the preprint).  An alternate axiomatization could use ~ axc5c711 in place of ~ ax-c5 , ~ ax-c7 , and ~ ax-11 . This axiom is obsolete and should no longer be used.  It is proved above as theorem ~ axc7 .  (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-1993.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: ax-c7 $p |- ( -. A. x -. A. x ph -> ph ) $.
